name: Your Colors
description:
You are a young dragon about to go through your color ritual. Feeling a little lost, you decide to ask for the elder dragons for advice on understanding who you are.

Walk around the cliffs, found and talk to the elder dragons and see what they have to say about color picking.

- Move around using the keyboard arrows and W, A, S, D;

- Move the players view with the mouse;

- Interact with the dragon by clicking on it and on the texts.

This game was made during Train Jam 2019 by Queer Club 🌈
